description: Dependency tree of the installed python packages
usage: pipdeptree [-h] [-v] [-w [{silence,suppress,fail}]] [--python PYTHON] [--path PATH] [-p P] [-e P] [-l | -u] [-f] [--encoding E] [-a] [-d D] [-r] [--license] [-j | --json-tree | --mermaid | --graph-output FMT]

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --version
options.description: show program's version number and exit

options.name: --packages
options.description: comma separated list of packages to show.

options.name: --exclude
options.description: comma separated list of packages to not show.

options.name: --local-only
options.description: do not show globally installed packages.

options.name: --user-only
options.description: only show installations in the user site dir.

options.name: --freeze
options.description: print names so as to write freeze files

options.name: --encoding
options.description: the encoding to use when writing to the output

options.name: --all
options.description: list all deps at top level

options.name: --depth
options.description: limit the depth of the tree

options.name: --reverse
options.description: render the dependency tree in the reverse fashion

options.name: --license
options.description: list the license(s) of a package

options.name: --json-tree
options.description: nested JSON mimics the text format layout
